document.full_text: the imam of a florida mosque and his two sons, one also a muslim spiritual leader, were arrested saturday on charges of financing and supporting the pakistani taliban, u.s. officials said.
document.title: florida imams arrested for aiding pakistani taliban
lines_and_colors: the imam of a florida mosque and his two sons, one also a muslim spiritual leader, were arrested saturday on charges of financing and supporting the pakistani taliban, u.s. officials said.
